Title: The Bent-Neck Lady
Writer: Meredith Averill, Mike Flanagan (created by), Shirley Jackson (based on the novel by)
Actors: Michiel Huisman, Carla Gugino, Henry Thomas, Elizabeth Reaser
Plot: A dark specter with an unsettling silhouette has haunted Nell since she was a girl. Now "the Bent-Neck Lady" is back -- and she's calling Nell home.
